nodes.text: The Trade Federation Recruitment Center was a organization within the Trade Federation which existed in the final decades of the Galactic Republic. By 32 BBY the center had put out a bounty on the Ugnaught engineer and criminal Onicrop K'Cin who they claimed had knowledge of Trade Federation encryption codes and expertise in forging false identities. They offered a reward 1500 credits for his capture alive and only half that if he was brought in dead. The bounty was claimed in 32 BBY by the Mandalorian bounty hunter Jango Fett, who captured K'Cin alive on Outland Transit Station, whilst Fett was there hunting the Muttani criminal Meeko Ghintee. The stations Toydarian owner Rozatta was the one who informed Fett of the center's bounty on K'Cin.

The Trade Federation Recruitment Center was fist mentioned in the video game Star Wars: Bounty Hunter released by LucasArts in 2002. The center was mentioned in the e-scanner bounty entry for Onicrop K'cin, a secondary bounty available during the second level of the first chapter.
